experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
experiences.subtitle: Nitage Design Labs Pvt. Ltd.
workDescription: Devloped and Maintaining the Current website of NitageDL.
Developed and maintained the LawFaxAI website, a specialized platform for legal professionals, enhancing case management and document generation using AI.
Engineered the entire backend architecture, including database schemas and server-side logic, hosted on AWS to ensure scalability and security.
Collaborated closely with a frontend developer to integrate ReactJS, ensuring a seamless user experience and responsive design.

Tools, Frameworks, Database & Libraries used: HTML, CSS, Javascript, Reactjs, Nodejs, Express, Sqlite, Mysql, PHP, Material UI, Formik, Emailjs, Razorpay, jwt Token, Io socket, Pupeeter, AWS, Docker, Postman, Git, Hostinger, wordpress, Bluehost etc.
